title: How I Unified Two Global Commerce Platforms Through Strategic Design

description: Discover how we enhanced platform flexibility to empower brands with greater control over their commerce assets.

description: Learn how I developed an innovative testing framework that accelerated our product launch while ensuring quality.

description: I was tasked with improving the Central purchase flow for customers to seamlessly navigate from the marketing site into the product.

description: Learn how I collaborated with a product team to design an intuitive help portal that improved customer support and reduced support tickets.

description: See how iterative prototyping and user feedback shaped the development of a new analytics product for media buyers.
